div.div: Update button styles in CategoriesPage to use modern variant

Refines user ID handling for DummyJSON API integration
Enhances the method of extracting the DummyJSON user ID from the logged-in user's information.
Introduces specific handling for demo users, ensuring a consistent user ID is generated based on either the username hash or a parsed demo ID.
Updates personal information display to clarify ownership and consistency for user data retrieved from the API.

Adds user data fetching and address/payment management
Implements functionality to fetch user data from an external API and manage addresses and payment methods within the settings page.
Enhances the user experience by allowing users to add new addresses and payment methods, while displaying existing ones as read-only.
Also includes validation for input fields to ensure all required information is provided before submission.
Fixes #123
Adds settings option to user menu for easier access to profile settings
Adds fetchUserById function to retrieve a specific user by ID from DummyJSON API

Enhances accessibility and user experience in forms
Improves accessibility by adding aria attributes to the discount button and ensures consistent keyboard event handling across forms.
Changes include: - Updated the discount input and button to use `onKeyDown` for better keyboard interaction. - Added aria-label and aria-disabled attributes for improved screen reader support.
Relates to enhancing overall usability in the application.

Adds university and company details to DummyUser interface
Enhances the DummyUser interface by including new fields for university and company details.
This update provides a more comprehensive structure for user information, allowing for better representation of user affiliations and employment data.

Adds settings page for user profile and preferences
Implements a comprehensive settings page that allows users to manage their profile information, notification preferences, privacy settings, and billing details.
Enhances user experience by providing a structured interface for updating personal data, changing passwords, and managing notification options.
Introduces form validation and user feedback through toast notifications to improve interaction and error handling.
Relates to user account management enhancement.

Updates Premium tier highlight styling
Adjusts the background color of the "Most Popular" label for the Premium tier to enhance visibility and consistency with the design.
Improves user experience by making the label more prominent.

Enhances MembershipCard layout and styling
Improves the layout of the MembershipCard component by updating the flex properties to ensure better alignment and spacing.
Adjusts border styles for the current tier and enhances the overall visual effect with consistent styling.
These changes aim to provide a more user-friendly interface and better highlight the premium membership benefits.
Refactor login page to use useEffect for redirecting logged-in users
Fix button text color variant for improved accessibility and consistency.
Adds shopping bag icon to hero sections on Categories and Sale Items pages for enhanced visual appeal.
Removes background gradient overlay from category item for improved visibility of product badges.
Removes background color from hero section overlay for improved visual clarity.
Enhances CategoriesPage layout with a new hero section, improved category stats, and dynamic product images; updates Button component variants for better styling consistency.
Refactors HomePage hero section for improved layout and styling; updates background image, adds new text elements, and enhances category showcase with larger cards and better responsiveness.
Refactors HomePage component to fetch and display featured products dynamically; adds new hero section, category showcase, and features section highlighting shopping benefits.
Removes unused decoration and shopping images to clean up the project assets
Updates button variants in ProductGrid component from "outline" to "classic" and from "default" to "modern" for improved styling consistency.
Refactors HomePage layout with new hero section, featured products, and category showcase; integrates ProductGrid component and adds newsletter subscription form.

Wraps order confirmation and tracking pages with Suspense
Improves user experience by preventing hydration mismatches and providing loading states during server-side rendering.
Extracts main page content into separate components and adds custom loading fallbacks with skeleton animations to maintain visual consistency while pages load.
Adds Size Guide page with comprehensive sizing charts, measurement tips, and fit advice
Adds comprehensive returns and exchanges page with form and FAQ section
